English:
Enemy slowdown
Door reinforcement
Charge up fire
Description: A short description of what the C-foam launcher tool is used for, and how it's used. I.e. the foam slows down enemies, it can be used to reinforce doors, and you need to charge it up before each "shot".

French.Translation:
Ralentissement des ennemis
Renforcement des portes
Chargement du tir

Italian.Translation:
Rallentamento nemico
Rafforzamento porta
Caricamento necessario

Spanish.Translation:
Ralentización de enemigos
Refuerzo de puertas
Recarga de disparos

Russian.Translation:
Замедление врага
Усиление дверей
Требуется перезарядка

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation:
Desaceleração de inimigo
Reforço de porta
Carga pré-disparo

Polish.Translation:
Spowalnianie przeciwników
Wzmacnianie drzwi
Tryb ognia z ładowaniem

Japanese.Translation:
敵スローダウン
ドア強化
チャージアップによる発射

Korean.Translation:
적 감속
문 강화
충전 사격

Chinese_Traditional.Translation:
敵人減速
門強固
充能射擊

Chinese_Simplified.Translation:

加固门
